sentences: Me peame kinnitama, et see on hea mõte ütleme.
Olen rahul, et saate seda teada, me ütleme.
Tema vastus oli: "Kui me ei suuda seda öelda, siis me ei peaks seda tegema".
context: The word 'ütleme' is the first person plural form of the verb 'to say'. It is used when a group including oneself (e.g. I and you) says something.
